content: l l d ittle arkspur esigns simplicity beanie simple cozy fun not everything we create or do has to be intricate or challenging in order to be beautiful and amazing sometimes beauty is found in the simplicity of it all or as leonardo da vinci said simplicity is the ultimate sophistication the simplicity beanie is a quick knit it s simple and it s cozy before starting i recommend reading the pattern first as there are helpful hints throughout ©2022 little larkspur designs ● simplicity beanie ● all rights reserved skill level beginner method knit in the round from the bottom up fine if you meet gauge approximately 70 yards gauge wak the wool 9 stitches x 12 rounds = 4x4 stockinette in the round on us 15 / 10mm malabrigo rasta 10 stitches x 12 rounds = 4x4 stockinette in the round on us 15 / 10mm note it is important to obtain gauge for the hat to fit properly certain yarns can alter gauge for instance you may have to add additional rounds or cast on more stitches if using lion brand thick & quick as it s a lighter weight 6 yarn whereas wak the wool or sugar bush chill are bulkier weight 6 yarns so you may have to subtract rounds or cast on fewer stitches size fit & finished measurements adult 8 5 wide x 8 75 tall 20-22 head circumference easy to adjust the fit to alter the fit increase/decrease needle size for a slightly larger/smaller hat increase or decrease
